author: Firnas Aliyar
comment: This is a better watch face in similar series. Please improve with some more features.  1. Option to make the seconds mark to either tick or sweep 2. Remove "ZERO" comes in the middle. For ex. 10:05 shows as TEN ZERO FIVE. At least make this in settings so that people still need to see ZERO can enable in settings. 3. There was no black background in the available backgrounds. When I take a photo of a dark / black color, it throws an error. So I had to go for black with some other color combination. Please fix this.  Thank you.

author: Nomusa Magic
comment: How about paid version? Love, love, love app but MULTIPLE LONGGGG VIDEO ads in between trying out various colors in one use = SUPER annoying, time consuming & loud. ZERO interest in COERCION to watch vids or add apps. Esp when changing watch faces in quiet setting. Plz consider! SGNote5 on VZW

author: Evan Cleppe
comment: Awesome app. I love gradient backgrounds and now I can easily change it daily and have it match my clothes.  It would be nice if there was a bit more customization though. A digital clock option would be awesome because if you have a watch notification, the third line of the time is cut off. Other than that I think the app is great!

author: Ben McCluskey
comment: Could you add the option to change the seconds circle to black when the text colour is changed to black? Thank you. Crashes every time I take a picture for a background colour.
title: Brilliant design

author: Sarah Massey
comment: Love this app but the adverts are so annoying. I don't want to watch a 5 min video about something I don't care for when all I want to do is change my watch screen. Very disappointing aspect to a really lovely app

author: lars cleghorn
comment: seems broken after the latest update from android wear, tried uninstalling, reinstalling, factory reset the moto 360 and the app refuses to pick up the watch, i am thinking it needs an update

author: James Pollitt
comment: No matter what the face doesn't show up in the android wear app and so can't be set on the watch.
title: Can't set on watch

author: Randy Quilala
comment: I like the presentation of color coordination based on one's outfit. However, I'd like to see an option for a colorwheel, or rather, custom color values, so that there's no need to launch the camera just to get a color.
title: Almost...

author: Andrew LeDawson
comment: Cards cover up the watch face, why not make them smaller?
title: A start

author: Adam Short
comment: Any chance of supporting complications? Love the simplicity of the watch face.

author: Tim Carr
comment: Could use some more options like a battery indicator, but definitely the best text watch face available.
title: Nice!

author: Simon Tribbeck
comment: Lovely watch face but could really do with a smaller notification cards options as they ruin the watch face
title: Lovely

author: Hardik Thakkar
comment: Doesn't set on Asus zen watch 3
Just bought lg urbane 2nd edition works great
title: Great watch face

author: Aburehan Malik
comment: Its awesome watch face Hats off for yu...... 👍

author: Tommy Houle
comment: I love it ! Great Job !

author: Virginia Poltrack
comment: I love the color choices (and customization options). It's such a clean, classy face that really looks great!

author: Jeanne Sutton
comment: Need a watch face to match your outfit?  Look no further.  Snap a picture of top, pants, etc. and customize your gradient watchface for a "Just for You" look.  Love, love, love this!!

author: Ben Schoon
comment: Excellent, works great on my LG G Watch R and the customization options are wonderful.

author: Amanda Madsen
comment: LOVE the customization options for the Glow watch face. You even have the ability to take a picture of a color you like and customize your watch face from there. Classy, simple yet elegant. Love it!!  Kudos to the designer!!

author: Kyle Kumar
comment: This watch face has everything you need, full customization and a clean and minimal look!
title: Really customizable

author: Nick Butcher
comment: Love the camera integration! 😀

author: Will K.
comment: Love it.
title: Congrats Stephanie!

author: Krystian Drożdżyński
comment: Add Muzei support

author: Jerry Wilmink
comment: Awesome app for personalization

author: Xin Jiang
comment: Looks great with your different outfits!
title: Simply fantastic!
